content: looking for a unique winter hat pattern this two-color crochet hat pattern features a colorful and eye-catching design it is perfect for advanced beginners looking to level up their skills keep scrolling for the step-by-step instructions and create your own stylish crochet hat pattern is written in us terms materials 175 yards of lion brand local grown in vanilla bean color a 100 yards of lion brand local grown in moss color b crochet hook size h 5mm crochet hook size j 6mm tapestry needle scissors tape measure faux fur pom or pom-pom maker for yarn pom optional size one size adult finished size will be approx 19 in circumference and 9 5 high after closing
